title:
Satya Nadella on AI-empowered India to accelerate inclusive growth and 
development
text: Microsoft’s chairman and CEO, Satya Nadella on stage at the CEO Connection event in Mumbai. With its fourth datacenter region set to go live soon, and datacenters in collaboration with Jio, Microsoft boasts more datacenter regions than any other cloud provider in India.
